short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps to automatically fill all your data for Green Card Lottery (Electronic Diversity Visa Program, EDVP) with one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Auto fill all fields at Electronic Visa Diversity Program (EDVP) website!

You can automatically fill information for:
- Main applicant 
- Spouse
- Children

Use this extension when:
✅ EDVP website is shutting down
✅ High volume of entrants
✅ Fill once and use this data repeatedly
✅ You want to save your time

All your data saved only on your local machine.
